name: Darn Tough ABC Midweight Hiker Cushion Boot Socks - Unisex
categories: ABC Midweight Hiker Cushion Boot Socks
description: Anti-odour. Breathable. Comfortable. These cushioned socks are a naturally antimicrobial wool blend that stands up to long days on the trail.Made of moisture-wicking fine-gauge merino wool, nylon and Lycra® for coolness in the summer, warmth in winter.Cushioned sole provides great comfort without bulk.Seamless construction provides a smooth fit and ensures no slipping, no bunching and no blisters.Reinforced heel and toe.Darn Tough sources its wool from non-mulesed sheep.
